text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Lying/misleading Americans: Chloroquine is a medicine that fights parasites that cause malaria. COVID-19 is a virus, not a parasite. After your first mention associating this medication with COVID-19 people have overdosed with it thinking they would be protected from COVID-19.
